name: Winter Pong [OGA GameJam]
description: Small game prototype for the winter Open Game Art gamejam. It's a simple 3D pong/arkanoid style game. I made only one level but could add some others in the future I also had some difficulties with some bugs, then I didn't have much time to continue working on it and had to stop. So the final result is very simple. I made it using Godot 3.2.
